task.summary: Added base logic to the board loader.
Added experimental drag and drop using Gridstack.
Added API Controller. Added GetAll method.
Added Board rendering and added event capture of movement in the board.
Added find task and moveTo to hep the API to handle easier requests.
Added move API with Ajax functionality
Added Add Task API with Ajax functionality
